user_query: I'm a food blogger and I'm looking for unique recipes to share with my audience using specific ingredients like avocado and quinoa. I also need information about the nutritional value of these ingredients, as well as historical facts about their origin.

TaskList.description: Search for unique recipes that include avocado and quinoa.
Retrieve nutritional information for avocado and quinoa.
Gather historical facts about the origin of avocado and quinoa, including who first used them and notable artists who depicted them.
